page.title: 06Recreation Excluding Sport
page.content: Walken & Ardely offer a surprising wide range of recreational facilities. Excluding sport, these include a mother & toddler group, playgroup, scouts & brownies, 2 branches of WIs, the Walkern Friendly Club, Over 60's Club in both villages, a gardening club, art class, & Young Farmers, who meet in a 'hut' in Clay End. A number of events e.g. Mayday celebrations, exhibitions, Christmas entertainment, raffles etc are assosicated with the schools, pubs or churches. Most of these activities take place in the 2 village halls or in the Walkern Sports & Recreation Club. However it remains likely that after television the main leisure pursuit is visiting one of the 4 public houses. Many people, particularly the younger generation, look outside the area, mostly to Stevenage, for recreational activities
